text: Ana nganijim’bichilila wanganyammwe abali ja awala wapaujo penu? Wandu wa Nuhu, wa Adi ni wa Samuda, kwisa soni awala wamunyuma mwao, wangaakwamanyilila ikaweje Allah? Waichilile Achimitenga wao ni ilosyo yakuonechela, basi ni wauchisye magasa gao kukamwa kwao (paagaluma ligongo lyaukali), ni watite: “Chisimu uwwe tukaaniile yantumisyidwe nayoyi, soni chisimu uwwe tuli nchikaiko chekulungwa chakaichila yankutuwilanjilayi.”
